titleStmt.title: P.Dion.Herm.
Bull. Ain-Shams U. Center of Papyrological Studies and Inscriptions, vol. 18

bibl.title: Bull. Ain-Shams U. Center of Papyrological Studies and Inscriptions, vol. 18
An edition of unpublished Greek papyrus documents from Dionysias and some papyri of Cairo museum
